source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenery shot looking down into the murky, greenish water of a swimming pool. The bottom is lined with a grid of small, square tiles, with a darker, wet-looking patch visible in the center. The scene is largely static with very subtle water movement.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a scenery shot looking down into the murky, greenish water of a swimming pool. The bottom is lined with a grid of small, square tiles, with a darker, wet-looking patch visible in the center. The scene is largely static with very subtle water movement.

bad_caption: A group of brightly colored fish swim in circles near the surface of a clear blue lake, occasionally darting toward the shore before regrouping in the center. One fish briefly jumps out of the water and splashes back down, causing ripples that spread outward. The fish continue their coordinated movement throughout the video.
